name: Memory Booster
description:
Memory Booster – is a incremental puzzle game about memorizing tiles. This game is a perfect one for upgrading your brains and training memory!

Game Features
  • Upgrade your stats (lives, observation time etc) every 3 levels
  • Train your memory: just 15 minutes per day will increase your memory
  • Every new level is a little bit harder than previous - can you reach the last one?
  • Nice and chill soundtrack
  • Steam Achievements support
